description: Surrounded by walls dating back to the 13C, this intimate and romantic setting is typical of old Spoleto. With their exposed beams and stonework, the elegant dining rooms are the perfect backdrop for superb, traditional Umbrian cuisine, to which the chef adds a few fish dishes.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
